## AlLocatorMatrix.normalizeContext() method

This method normalizes the current context. In practice, this means mapping an insight location ID to the correct defender datacenter. In other words, it is "black magic." Or at least, dark gray.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected normalizeContext(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
